### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/T7_5.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/T7_5_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: T7.5.web.orig**, version v2.0) requires review 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.5.web.mix**, version v1.0) superceeded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: T7.5.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.5.web.orig**, version v1.0) requires review 
 - Indicative Map (**code: T7.5.IM.mix**, version v1.0) requires review 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.5.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) superceeded 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **Anthromes-v2.0** (Monfreda CN, Ramankutty N, Foley JA  2008).
 - **Consistent-Land-Use-2000** (Erb et al. 2007).
 - **EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0** (Tuanmu et al. 2014).
 - **Resolve-Ecoregions-2017** (Dinerstein et al. 2017).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                  |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|:------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Anthromes-v2.0           |<http://ecotope.org/anthromes/v2/data/>{target='links'} :: <https://earthdata.nasa.gov/learn/user-resources/who-uses-nasa-earth-science-data-user-profiles/user-profile-dr-navin-ramankutty>{target='links'} :: <https://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/set/anthromes-anthropogenic-biomes-world-v1>{target='links'} :: <https://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/collection/anthromes>{target='links'} |
|Consistent-Land-Use-2000 |<https://boku.ac.at/wiso/sec/data-download>{target='links'} :: <https://boku.ac.at/fileadmin/data/H03000/H73000/H73700/Data_Download/Global_land_use_2000_fin.pdf>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0  |<https://earthenv.org//landcover>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|Resolve-Ecoregions-2017  |<https://ecoregions2017.appspot.com/>{target='links'} :: <https://geospatial.tnc.org/datasets/7b7fb9d945544d41b3e7a91494c42930_0>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**T7.5.web.orig** (v2.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_5_web_orig){target="gisdata"}

**T7.5.web.mix** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T7.5.web.mix_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091087){target="gisdata"} :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_5_web_mix){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

**T7.5.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958622){target="gisdata"}

**T7.5.IM.mix** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T7.5.IM.mix_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell-output-display}

|Consistent-Land-Use-2000 |Publication :: applies publisher copyrights                                                                                    |
|EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0  |https://www.re3data.org/repository/r3d100013469 :: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/                             |
|Resolve-Ecoregions-2017  |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/                                                                                   |


:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Monfreda CN, Ramankutty N, Foley JA  (2008) *Farming the planet: 2. Geographic distribution of crop areas, yields, physiological types, and net primary production in the year 2000* **Global Biogeochemical Cycles** 22: GB1022 
 - Tuanmu, M.-N. and W. Jetz (2014) *A global 1-km consensus land-cover product for biodiversity and ecosystem modeling* **Global Ecology and Biogeography** 23(9):1031--1045 [DOI:10.1111/geb.12182](http:dx.doi.org/10.1111/geb.12182) 
 - Dinerstein E, Olson D, Joshi A, Vynne C, Burgess ND, Wikramanayake E, Hahn N, Palminteri S, Hedao P, Noss R, Hansen M, Locke H, Ellis EE, Jones B, Barber CV, Hayes R, Kormos C, Martin V, Crist E, Sechrest W, Price L, Baillie JEM, Weeden D, Suckling K, Davis C, Sizer N, Moore R, Thau D, Birch T, Potapov P, Turubanova S, Tyukavina A, de Souza N, Pintea L, Brito JC, Llewellyn Barnekow Lillesø JP, van Breugel P, Graudal L, Voge M, Al-Shammari KF, Saleem M (2017) *An Ecoregion-Based Approach to Protecting Half the Terrestrial Realm*, **BioScience** 67: 534–545. DOI:[10.1093/biosci/bix014](https://doi.org/10.1093/biosci/bix014). [Data-set available on-line](https://ecoregions2017.appspot.com/) 
 - Karl-Heinz Erb, Veronika Gaube, Fridolin Krausmann, Christoph Plutzar, Alberte Bondeau & Helmut Haberl (2007) *A comprehensive global 5 min resolution land-use data set for the year 2000 consistent with national census data* **Journal of Land Use Science** 2:3, 191-224 [DOI:10.1080/17474230701622981](http:dx.doi.org/10.1080/17474230701622981)
